name: Heroic Return
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
After 15 minutes, you name a creature that has died prematurely. If they are willing, they return to life in an empty space you choose, fully healed as if they had finished a rest.

This spell cannot revive a creature that has passed away from old age or natural causes.
empower: Removes the Ritual tag and sets the AP cost to 3.
